name: JUMP!! (GGH Games)
description:
JUMP!! is a simple platformer which has roughly 2 hours of gaming.

In JUMP!! you have to get to the finish line by avoiding the floor which is somehow lava. It has 150 total levels and 50 unique levels. Most of these levels are hard and rewarding to complete.

This game has taken me a long time to make, it's my first, so please donate it would really help me out.

I hope you make it past level 1 and Good Luck!
